comment: The set ` G ` of the "simple pseudographs" with a fixed set of vertices ` V ` and the class ` R ` of the symmetric relations on the fixed set ` V ` are equinumerous. For more details about the class ` G ` of all "simple pseudographs" see comments on ~ uspgrbisymrel . (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2021.)
